title.native: マブラヴ オルタネイティヴ

description:
A story of the bonds between those who fight, in a world pushed to its limits. On one of the countless parallel worlds that exist throughout spacetime, humanity has fought a decades long war against the BETA, hostile extraterrestrial invaders, using humanoid fighting machines called Tactical Surface Fighters. This is a story of how humanity lives and dies while on the brink of extinction…

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Real Robot
tags.description: Prominently features mechanical designs loosely influenced by real-world robotics.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

node.description: Twitter __Yukio Nishimoto__ is a Japanese director, animation director, episode director and storyboard artist.

Representative director of âge at ACID Co., Ltd. and one of the founding members of doujin circle "relic" (now: âge). He's the creator of the successful visual novel Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, Muv-Luv and Muv-Luv Alternative. He also did mechanical design for the Muv-Luv franchise and wrote other side-stories related. His real name is Yoshida Hirohiko.
Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). He is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

__Residency:__ Hino City, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Berklee College of Music (Department of Film Scoring)

[Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/evancall) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/evan.call.33) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0nMGbTpPx4b3h5fMG9CpWJ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/realevancall)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfiSo8tO3WPU-8YOgr4Ba6g) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/vwp_virtual)

**V.W.P**, also known as Virtual Witch Phenomenon is a virtual singer group, signed under the label KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO. The group consists of:

- [KAF](https://anilist.co/staff/168254/Kaf)
- [RIM](https://anilist.co/staff/249497/Rim)
- [ISEKAIIJOUCHO](https://anilist.co/staff/273976/Isekaijoucho)
- [HARUSARUHI](https://anilist.co/staff/262530/Harusaruhi)
- [KOKO](https://anilist.co/staff/250353/Koko)

__[Profile (Lantis)](http://www.lantis.jp/artist/stereodivefoundation/bio.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Stereo Dive Foundation__ is the solo sound making project of Japanese musician [Ryuuta Iida](https://anilist.co/staff/106037), otherwise known as Ron (stylized as R・O・N)

**[Website (Kamitsubaki)](https://kanzakiiori.kamitsubaki.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kurogaki0311) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kurogaki0311) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv1KOiaRusvqOR4BrT9Sh8w) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@iori_kanzaki)**

__Introduction:__
__Iori Kanzaki__ is a Japanese Vocaloid producer, singer-songwriter and vocalist.

__Biography:__
In January 2014, he made his debut in Vocaloid-P by posting "[Hankouki](https://youtu.be/nYcSlZKyAD0)".
In 2017, the song "[Inochi ni Kiwarete iru.](https://youtu.be/0HYm60Mjm0k)" was released and has since garnered an impressive 24 million plays as of 2023.
Responsible for writing, composing and arranging all the original songs of the virtual singer "[KAF](https://anilist.co/staff/168254)".
April 2019 saw the release of his first album, "Hakushi," which featured a collection of his popular tracks.
In February 2020, he unveiled a special box set that seamlessly merged his passion for storytelling with his musical talents. This unique release included the first full-length novel, "Beast," along with the EP "[Life is Comedy](https://youtu.be/t-Ux4ccMCGE)."
In September 2020, "Ano Natsu ga Houwa Suru.", a substantially revised edition of the long novel "Beast" initially launched in February, was released by Kawade Shobo.
In June 2021, he ventured into full-scale self-vocals.
Following his first one-man live performance, the release of his second album, "Clumsy Man," followed suit.
The BOX edition of this release also included his new novel, "Shin'ai Naru Anata e," which was published in November 2021 by Kawade Shobo.
A manga adaptation, titled "[Ano Natsu ga Houwa Suru.](https://anilist.co/manga/159516)", based on his first novel of the same name, commenced serialization in August 2022.
In May 2023, after graduating from Kamitsubaki Studio, he launched his own label, Ikuru Shelf, to kickstart his activities.

**[Website (Kamitsubaki)](https://kanzakiiori.kamitsubaki.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kurogaki0311) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kurogaki0311) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv1KOiaRusvqOR4BrT9Sh8w) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@iori_kanzaki)**

[Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/43177/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fpworks)

Ryousuke Fukai is a Japanese illustrator and character designer.
Twitter __Yukio Nishimoto__ is a Japanese director, animation director, episode director and storyboard artist.

Hiroshi Shirai is a Japanese CG artist, animator and director. He was formerly affiliated with [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO). After graduating from Digital Hollywood, he joined Gonzo's digital division and contributed in the CGI animation production for many of Gonzo's projects, those including [Blue Submarine No. 6](https://anilist.co/anime/1051/Blue-Submarine-No-6/), [Melty Lancer THE ANIMATION](https://anilist.co/anime/1155/Melty-Lancer-THE-ANIMATION/), [Vandread](https://anilist.co/anime/180/Vandread/) and [Yukikaze](https://anilist.co/anime/1080/Yukikaze/).

In 2009, when Gonzo sold its digital division to Q-tec. He along with 24 other former Gonzo employees became part of the newly established animation studio [Graphinica](https://anilist.co/studio/894/Graphinica) and has remained there since.

Outside the anime industry, Shirai also worked on video games such as Nintendo's Xenoblade Chronicles series and The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild under Graphinica.

__Notable works outside anime:__
~!
- Xenoblade Chronicles (Video Game, 2010), (Cinematics: Lead Animation)
- Xenoblade Chronicles X (Video Game, 2015), (Cutscenes: Cutscene Direction, Storyboards)
- The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Video Game, 2017), (Assistant Cinematic Directors) 
- Xenoblade Chronicles 2 (Video Game, 2017), (Cinematic Direction, Cutscenes: Cutscene Direction, Cutscene Storyboarding)
- Xenoblade Chronicles 3 (Video Game, 2022), (Cinematic Directors, Cutscene Director, Cutscene Storyboard Artists) !~
